CustomField.description: Tax Code from the Bill-To Account
CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Bill_To__c )), Bill_To__r.Tax_Code__c ,if( NOT(ISBLANK( Agency_Name__c )) , Agency_Name__r.Tax_Code__c , Account.Tax_Code__c ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Tax Code from the Bill-To Account
CustomField.label: Tax Code
